name: Premium Fountain Pen
description: Experience the art of writing with our premium fountain pen. Crafted with precision and elegance, this pen features a smooth ink flow system and ergonomic grip for comfortable extended writing sessions. Perfect for professionals, students, and writing enthusiasts.

name: Executive Ballpoint Pen
description: Professional ballpoint pen designed for executive use. Features a sleek metallic finish and smooth writing experience that makes every signature count. Comes with premium refills and elegant presentation box.

name: Leather Journal
description: Premium leather-bound journal for notes, sketches, and creative ideas. Features high-quality paper that handles various writing instruments beautifully. Perfect for professionals, artists, and everyday note-taking.

name: Watercolor Paint Set
description: Professional watercolor paint set with 24 vibrant colors. Includes mixing palette, brushes, and water container. Perfect for artists, students, and hobbyists looking to create beautiful watercolor paintings.

name: Bamboo Desk Organizer
description: Sustainable bamboo desk organizer with multiple compartments for pens, pencils, clips, and small office supplies. Eco-friendly design that keeps your workspace tidy and organized.

name: Gel Pen Set
description: Set of 12 smooth-writing gel pens in assorted colors. Perfect for note-taking, journaling, and creative projects. Features comfortable grip and consistent ink flow.

name: Premium Sketch Pad
description: High-quality sketch pad with heavyweight paper perfect for pencil, charcoal, and pen drawings. Features perforated pages for easy removal and spiral binding for flat sketching.

name: Calligraphy Pen Set
description: Complete calligraphy pen set with multiple nib sizes, ink cartridges, and instruction guide. Perfect for learning calligraphy or improving existing skills. Includes practice sheets and elegant storage case.
